name: International Credit Insurance & Surety Association
membership:
International Trade and Forfaiting Association (ITFA)
International Surety Association (ISA)
goal: The object of the Association is to study questions relating to Credit Insurance and Surety, to provide opportunities for Members' employees to acquire knowledge of the theory and practice of credit insurance and surety underwriting, to represent the Membersâ€™ interests and to initiate means whereby the common action of the Members can be facilitated in order to develop their mutual relations in the interest of their national and the international economy, in the interest of their insured and in their own interest.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Solvency II, capital regulations, marketable risks, EMIR, Basel II and III, accounting standards
